text:
rent Childhood CNS Germ Cell Tumors
							                    Treatment of recurrent childhood central nervous system (CNS) germ cell tumors may include the following:         -  Chemotherapy followed by radiation therapy.    -  High-dose chemotherapy with stem cell rescue using the patient's stem cells.    - A clinical trial of a new treatment.",CancerGov,Childhood Central Nervous System Germ Cell Tumors
